import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Scanner;

class UserMainCode{
	public int[] placement(int input1,int[] input2){
		int[] output=new int[input1];
		int counter=0;
		for(int i=0;i<input1;i++){
			for(int j=0;j<i;j++){
				if(input2[j]>input2[i]){
					counter++;
				}
			}
			output[i]=counter;
			counter=0;
		}
		return output;
//		throw new UnsupportedOperationException("placement(int input1,int[] input2)");
	}
}
public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int input1=sc.nextInt();
		int[] input2=new int[input1];
		for(int i=0;i<input1;i++){
			input2[i]=sc.nextInt();
		}
		UserMainCode umc=new UserMainCode();
		System.out.println(Arrays.toString(umc.placement(input1, input2)));;
	}

}
